title: [BUG] MAUI.iOS app with SkiaSharp package is crashed while deploying from Visual Studio for Mac 2022
body:
**Description**

Simple MAUI.iOS app with [SkiaSharp](https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp/) package is crashed with below error message, when deploying it from Visual Studio for Mac 2022.

**_Note: Same MAUI.iOS application working properly, if we deployed it from Visual Studio for Windows 2022_**

**Error Message:**

`System.DllNotFoundException: @rpath/libSkiaSharp.framework/libSkiaSharp assembly:<unknown assembly> type:<unknown type> member:(null)`


**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  2.88.0-preview.155
- Last known good version:  None
- IDE:  Visual Studio 2022 for Mac (Preview)
- Platform Target Frameworks: net6.0-ios
  - macOS:  12.0.1
- Target Devices:   iPhone 13 Pro Max iOS 15.0 (Simulator)
  
<details>
  <summary>Detailed IDE/OS information (click to expand)</summary>
  
```

Simple MAUI.iOS app with [SkiaSharp](https://www.nuget.org/packages/SkiaSharp/) package is crashed with below error message, when deploying it from Visual Studio for Mac 2022.

**_Note: Same MAUI.iOS application working properly, if we deployed it from Visual Studio for Windows 2022_**

```
</details>


**Screenshots**

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/93113962/146522891-0e1c2032-4222-4c55-88f3-472d5725fbdf.png)


**Reproduction Link**

1. Create simple MAUI application by referring below link,
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/maui/get-started/first-app
2. Mention **net6.0-ios** (any iOS simulator) as your target platform.
3. Add **SkiaSharp** package version 2.88.0-preview.155 in your application.
4. Deploy your sample and try to open it.
5. Now app crashed with libSkiaSharp missing error.

**Note:** 

1. This sample is working properly in all other MAUI environments such as Windows, Android, and iOS (if deployed from Windows machine).
2. Without a SkiaSharp package application working properly in iOS simulator.

Attached a simple sample for references.
[MauiAppSkia.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/7734122/MauiAppSkia.zip)

comments.author: Joelicia
comments.body:
I am having the same issue with version 2.88.3.
Is there any news on this issue, did someone find a workaround ?

comments.author: jrc14
comments.body: Also experiencing this issue with version 2.88.3 - an update or workaround would be much appreciated - thanks!

comments.author: Joelicia
comments.body:
It seems like this is not a Skia bug, it is a Apple certificate issue. 
I came accross this thread and updating the certificates on my Mac worked for me:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/69049965/failed-to-codesign-libskiasharp

comments.author: ooikengsiang
comments.body:
I tested with SkiaSharp 2.88.3 and Mac Catalyst.
Initially it throw the DllNotFoundException when I first run the code, then I found this post.
Then after that I rebuild the whole solution and it work without problem.
